name: BURN
description: $BURN is a deflationary token on the XRPL designed to reduce its own supply over time through manual and future automated burns. With an initial supply of 1 quadrillion, over 935.7 trillion tokens have already been burned, bringing the total supply down to 64.3 trillion. Unlike traditional tokens, $BURN does not rely on mining or staking; instead, it increases scarcity by permanently removing tokens from circulation. NFT sales on XRP Cafe contribute to buybacks and burns, reinforcing the token’s deflationary model. $BURN transactions settle in 3-5 seconds with minimal fees, benefiting from XRPL’s efficiency. Future developments include automated burn mechanisms, liquidity enhancements, and expanded ecosystem integration, ensuring long-term sustainability and deflationary impact.
